message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the item you're selling, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer of $15000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not quite ready to accept that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $16500. This is a fair price considering the value I know the product holds, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal. What do you think?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of the item, I am still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
